section.name: About the Wren:DS Project
section.p: The Wren:DS community actively develops open source directory services, including a high performance, highly available, secure directory server, built-in data replication, client tools, and an LDAP SDK. Wren:DS offers extensive LDAPv3 support, as well as RESTful access to directory data over HTTP. Wren:DS DSML gateway enables applications accessing directory data through DSMLv2. All modules are 100% Java based and require at least Java 11.
